title: 75th Independence Day Celebration falling on 04th February 2023
decision_details:
- Cabinet approved the proposal made by the Hon. Prime Minister in his capacity as Minister of Public Administration, Home Affairs, Provincial Councils and Local Government for the appointment of a Cabinet Sub‑Committee under the following composition to organize and and monitor the arrangements of the 75th Independence Day Celebration falling on 04th February 2023. 

*	Hon. Ranil Wickremesinghe,
	The President,
	Minister of Defence and Minister of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policies 

*	Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena,
	Prime Minister,
	Minister of Public Administration, Home Affairs, 
	Provincial Councils and Local Government;

*	Hon. Douglas Devananda,
	Minister of Fisheries;

*	Hon. Susil Premajayantha,
	Minister of Education,

*	Hon. (Dr.) Bandula Gunawardena,
	Minister of Transport and Highways,
	Minister of Mass Media;

*	Hon. Keheliya Rambukwella
	Minister of Health,
	Minister of Water Supply;
*	Hon. Ali Sabry, 
	Minister of Foreign Affairs;

*	Hon. Vidura Wickramanayaka,
	Minister of Buddhasasana, Religious and Cultural Affairs 

*	Hon. Kanchana Wijesekera,
	Minister of Power and Energy;

*	Hon. Tiran Alles,
	Minister of Public Security
